name: Tahitian Vanilla Shampoo
description:
Tahitian Vanilla Shampoo

Sweet creamy caramel mixes with vibrant vanilla and a whisper of spice.

Rich bubbley natural shampoo that is easy on your scalp.  A little of this shampoo goes a long way. Great for dry/fine hair. We have waited a long time to add shampoo to our line up and we have finally come up with the perfect product to meet our high standards. We know you are going to love it too.

All shampoos are made in small batches to ensure that you receive the freshest product possible. 
Sulfate free (no SLS) ~ Paraben free ~ No Detergents ~ No Alcohol ~ Gluten Free ~ Cruelty Free ~ Vegan Friendly

SIZE:
This listing is for one (1) 8 oz flip top bottle of shampoo 

INGREDIENTS:
Purified Water, Triethanolamine Lauryl Sulfate (for lather), Cocamide MEA (coconut derived foaming & emulsifying agent),  fragrance oil

name: Midnight Pomegranate Sea Salt Spray
description:
Midnight Pomegranate Sea Salt Spray

Juicy red pomegranate with notes of anise, patchouli, blackberry, musk, dewberry, iris, vanilla, sandalwood, tobacco flower and cassis. 

Get gorgeous beachy waves without even setting foot in the ocean. Our sea salt spray is completely vegan and made from scratch with Aloe Vera, Mediterranean Sea Salt, Coconut Oil, Avocado and Argan Oils. I've been using sea salt spray for years and can not live with out it. 

SIZE:
This listing is for one (1) 8 oz spray top bottle of sea salt spray

DIRECTIONS: 
SHAKE WELL. Spritz on clean wet hair. Scrunch hair with towel to dry for beachy waves. Or spray on the roots of dry hair for added volume and texture.  

INGREDIENTS:
Purified water, aloe vera oil, mediterranean sea salt, epsom salt, coconut oil, avocado oil, argan oil, phenonip, fragrance oil

name: 6 Mini Soap Tropical Gift Set
description:
6 Mini Soaps all wrapped up for gifting!

Our mini soaps are a perfect way to try out new scents. Or grab your favorite to take with you while traveling. Or maybe you just love our soap and would like to share it with a friend!

These mini soaps have the same great ingredients and lovely scents as our full size soaps......just mini. They even come packaged in a mini version of our famous signature hand dyed teal cotton bag.

Our cute little mini soaps are approximately 2 ounces each! No skimpy little samples here. While mini, this soap packs a punch and will allow you to actually try the scent out in a shower or bath.

Lime in Da Coconut
Island Kisses
Bird of Paradise
Island Cocktail
Exotic Coconut
Island Chic

Our glycerin soaps are made with premium quality ingredients and always detergent free. Our soaps come in Shea Butter, Olive Oil or Coconut Milk. Rich bubbly lather that gently cleanses with out drying your skin.


INGREDIENTS: Mini Soaps may include the following. Please see individual listing for full ingredient list.
Olive Oil (Grade A extra virgin), Palm Oil, Coconut Oil, Safflower Oil, Glycerin (kosher, of vegetable origin), Shea Butter, Coconut Milk, Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide (saponifying agent), Sorbitol (moisturizer), Sorbitan oleate (emulsifier), Soy bean protein (conditioner), fragrance oil

description:

Wisk yourself away to the beach with this Coconut Milk Soap that is reminiscent of Hawaiian Tropics suntan lotion! This fruity paradise contains notes of creamy coconut, passion fruit, guava, pineapple, banana, melon, and grapefruit. 

We've left out our usual bright colors in favor of pretty calendula petals, to give this soap it's pretty texture.

...............

Our glycerin soaps are made with premium quality ingredients and always detergent free. Our soaps come in Shea Butter, Olive Oil or Coconut Milk. Rich bubbly lather that gently cleanses with out drying your skin.

All soaps made in small batches to ensure that you receive the freshest product possible. All soaps come wrapped in a 100% cotton muslin bag (made right here in the U.S.), dyed with chemical free dye in our signature Caribbean Blu. Get gorgeous beachy waves without even setting foot in the ocean. Our sea salt spray is completely vegan and made from scratch with Aloe Vera, Mediterranean Sea Salt, Coconut Oil, Avocado and Argan Oils. I've been using sea salt spray for years and can not live with out it. 

SIZE:
This listing is for one (1) 8 oz spray top bottle of sea salt spray

DIRECTIONS: 
SHAKE WELL. Spritz on clean wet hair. Scrunch hair with towel to dry for beachy waves. Or spray on the roots of dry hair for added volume and texture.  

INGREDIENTS:
Purified water, aloe vera oil, mediterranean sea salt, epsom salt, coconut oil, avocado oil, argan oil, phenonip, fragrance oil

A spicy, creamy, berry blend of French vanilla, cinnamon, and carmalized sugar. 


Get gorgeous beachy waves without even setting foot in the ocean. Our sea salt spray is completely vegan and made from scratch with Aloe Vera, Mediterranean Sea Salt, Coconut Oil, Avocado and Argan Oils. I've been using sea salt spray for years and can not live with out it.
